= !WriteHandle property =

*Project:* [ConsoleAppClasses  Console Application Runner Classes].

*Unit:* _PJPipe_.

*Class:* _[TPJPipe TPJPipe]_.

{{{
property WriteHandle: THandle;
}}}

== Description ==

This read only property provides access to Windows handle used to write data to the pipe. If this handle is inheritable can be passed to _[TPJConsoleApp TPJConsoleApp]_'s _[TPJConsoleAppStdOut StdOut]_ and _[TPJConsoleAppStdErr StdErr]_ properties to redirect a console application's standard output and standard error to pipes.

Do not pass this handle to any Windows API function that may alter it (e.g. _!CloseHandle_). If you need to close _!WriteHandle_ to signal end-of-file then use the _[TPJPipeCloseWriteHandle CloseWriteHandle]_ method. _[TPJPipeCloseWriteHandle CloseWriteHandle]_ closes the handle and sets it to 0.

_!WriteHandle_ should not be used when 0.
